testcase.classname: Feature to test the login functionality

testcase.system-out: Given User launch the browser...............................................passed And User open the Zero banking application..................................passed And click signin button on home page........................................passed When User enter 'username' and 'password'...................................passed And click Signin button.....................................................passed Then User should be redirected to the Users home page.......................passed
